title: Your Favorite Typefaces
content:
We've all seen these threads over the years asking what's your favorite typeface? Well, ListGeeks has a sweet tool that essentially makes your pick a "vote".

Take a look and then create your own list. But don't blame me if you get hooked on Listgeeks. It's highly addictive.

[http://listgeeks.com/#!/view/favourite-typefaces/average](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424043941/http:/listgeeks.com/#!/view/favourite-typefaces/average)
author: Joe Pemberton
